Nornir-end¶

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes module¶

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.change_ipsec_keys(task, new_key)[source]¶

function for changing IPsec keys (Cisco)

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.change_on_spoke(task, option, hub_tunnel_ip, hub_nbma)[source]¶

function to add static hub mapping & BGP neighborship

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.conf_dmvpn(task, nr, dia, other_services=None, dns=None)[source]¶
function is performing the following tasks

  1. Create configuration backup on control node, configurations are saved to api/backup_configs

  2. Enable archive feature to create a backup of running-config of Host locally

  3. Extract WAN interface name from given IP

  4. Get WAN interface subnet & nexthop from default route

  5. Update inventory

  6. Build configuration template for both HUBS & SPOKES

  7. Push configs to devices

  8. Get SNMP interface Index of Tunnel414

  9. Update DNS

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.conf_ip_sla(task, track_ip)[source]¶

function to configure ip sla and hsrp tracking

params

track_ip: ip to track for sla

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.configure_copp(task)[source]¶

function parses the COPP template and push commands to hosts

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.configure_logging(task, logging_host, logging_level, facility)[source]¶

function for configuring logging on cisco devices

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.device_harderning(task)[source]¶

function for building & pushing device hardening commands to hosts

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.facts(task)[source]¶

function to gather the facts about devices 1. Check the device Platform and update Hosts table 2. Gather hostname,interfaces,model,serial_no,os_version ,vendor

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.fetch_cdp_data(task)[source]¶

function to get CDP Neighbors information by exec “show cdp neighbors”

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.fetch_interface_info(task)[source]¶

function return the ‘Show ip interface brief’ output

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.fortigate_neighbors(task)[source]¶
api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.get_routes(task)[source]¶
( Cisco devices)

  1. Get ‘Show run | sec interface’ output

  2. Get ‘Show run | inc ip route’ output

(Fortigate devices)

  1. Get “get system interface”

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.get_routing_table_cisco(task)[source]¶
api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.juniper_neighbors(task)[source]¶
api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.netmiko_direct(task, cmd)[source]¶

Manually create Netmiko connection, to handle prompts clear ip nat translations

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.remove_hosts(task)[source]¶

function for defining the method to remove configuration on Hosts

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.remove_hub_from_spoke(task, option, hub_tunnel_ip, hub_nbma)[source]¶

function to remove static hub mapping & BGP neighborship

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.resolve_host(task, dns)[source]¶

Function for resolving host fqdn from Uurnik DNS

api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.scp_file_transfer(task)[source]¶
api.nornir_stuff.configure_nodes.send_tcl(task)[source]¶

function for transfering the tcl script to schedule ip assignment
